changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, base_table.id , res.name AS grouping_agency, from_r.name AS from_relationship, from_p.name AS from_parent, c.name AS connection, to_r.name AS to_relationship, to_p.name AS to_parent, att.name AS authorized_attribute, base_table.text_value, base_table.integer_value, base_table.numeric_value, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM product_location_attribute_authorization base_table LEFT JOIN product_location_authorization na ON base_table.network_authorization = na.id LEFT JOIN agency res ON base_table.grouping_agency = res.id LEFT JOIN relationship from_r ON na.from_relationship = from_r.id LEFT JOIN product from_p ON na.from_parent = from_p.id LEFT JOIN relationship c ON na.connection = c.id LEFT JOIN relationship to_r ON na.to_relationship = to_r.id LEFT JOIN location to_p ON na.to_parent = to_p.id LEFT JOIN attribute att ON base_table.authorized_attribute = att.id LEFT JOIN agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
